version_description: - Minor updates for nationwide release

- Display quantity of rewards available on Rewards screen
- Updated "Tax" to "Estimated Tax" to indicate it is not final until checkout is complete
- Fix for reward redeem instructions getting truncated on small screens
Bug fixes & Enhancements

We made a number of enhancements and fixes in this version.

· Streamlined the logic of managing preferred store
· Added the ability to change delivery store directly in the basket

We are working on additional enhancements. Stay tuned!

We're excited to introduce several new features in this release as well as numerous bug fixes and UI enhancements.

Menu Search: You can now search for your favorite smoothies and other menu items quickly and easily.

We read your feedback. Have an idea for a feature you'd like to see in the app?
Drop us a line via the "Send Feedback" link under settings or on the login screen.

Bug fixes and enhancements.

We read your feedback. Have an idea for a feature you'd like to see in the app?
Drop us a line via the "Send Feedback" link under settings or on the login screen.

We’ve read our user comments and have some exciting new enhancements that will make locating and redeeming your offers in app easier! With these changes guests who are part of our Jamba Insider Rewards program will be able to see all promotional offers in their Offer Wallet, and redeem them through the app both by placing a digital order or directly at the register in store.

The updates in the release version include:

For Jamba Insider Rewards Members

• Offer Wallet

* See all promotional offers
* Scan present and scan digital promo coupons in-store

• In-Basket select from available promotions and apply coupon in one tap

For Everyone

• Manual coupon entry
 • Bug fixes and enhancements
Enhancements and minor bug fixes.
We're working hard to deliver you the best Jamba experience!

Say hello to new and improved Gift Card features!

• Save your gift card – use it for future online orders, or the next time you’re at Jamba.
• Buy a gift card – for yourself or as a gift.
• Reload your gift card – either one time, or set up a recurring reload.
• Check your gift card balance.

Love the app or have suggestions? Let us know at jambajuice.com!

- Minor bug fixes
- Enhancements
- iPhone X display compatibility
Bug fixes and enhancements
Online ordering menu enhancements for Toast locations.

A refreshed rewards and app experience that’s easier to use, easier to earn, and easier to enjoy.

Bug fixes and improvements

Thank you for using Jamba app! We run updates as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you.
Here are a couple of enhancements you’ll find in the latest update:

- Easier and more reliable sign up & log in,
- SMS opt-in to get the latest from Jamba,
- Performance improvements for easier and faster experience.
